elements: If the mind is a blade, this is a whetstone. [Study with two Erudition to gain Reason.]
'The poet makes himself a seer by an immense, long, deliberate derangement of all the senses...' The opposite of wisdom, thankfully. [Study with two Glimmerings to gain Passion.]
